About Us

HomesYeay is a kind of homestay, where you can feel the breeze of the wind, the warmth of the sun, and as peace as a home

  • 2009-2011

    Our Humble Beginnings

    It start from my needs while vacation. It is tend hard to find a homestay that full of services. From swimmingpool, garden, until playground for kids. Thats why I, initate the idea to make one.

  • October 2011

    HomesYeay is born!

    After we do many research from all online and offline, the feedback from many people that we already asked, yet they need "home" when they staycation. We know that there's still a lot of things that missing, but we keep developing!

  • April 2015

    Transition to Full Service

    A lot of services that we provide for our lovely customers. From booking rooms by our website, payment using credit card and paypal until more promos and packages. Who doesn't like promos???

  • February 2020

    Phase Two Expansion

    Expanding our kind-homestay to five cities around Indonesia, and we keep expanding! Cannot wiat to see more customers around this beautiful country! Wait for us to be there!

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

    Three most recomended Food and restos in Jakarta

    Enjoy your lovely meal with your love ones

    1. Pizza Place, Kemang, Jakarta Selatan
    2. Jon & Lou, SCBD, Jakarta Selatan
    3. Jontos Bar & Grill, Lotte Mall Jakarta, Jakarta Selatan

    Whats inside my luggage for vacation?

    Here some essential Indonesia packing list

    Indonesia – it’s a magical place! Epic waterfalls, lush forests, diverse landscapes. There are various beautiful places in Indonesia that you need to visit, especially if you are a nature lover!. Here some essentials things that you need to bring as Backpacker in Indonesia :

    1. Large Backpack
    2. Your Identitiy card
    3. Enough money in cash

    Gardening

    Need something green?

    There are a lot of things that we provide for you. One of it is gardening. Gardening is the most fun part from what we share with our customers. Its more like quality time between parents and kids with edutaiment in it. So share your memories with us!

    Playground

    Bring your kids with us!

    Seeing the kiddos smile while playing is the most remembered memories for us. It means that we could share our happiness to them. There are many toy that kiddos can exepriment. We choose the best for their pysics and help them to grow their logical thinks. We hope that we can help to develop your kids even just a small for it. Like what we said before, their smile is a heartwarming for us.

    Chairity

    IdentityWe do care about our society!

    We initiate a chairity event for twice in a year. We realize that by helping the society around us, we are useful for other people. Besides that, to remark how grateful HomesYeay from the first time building it until now. Be part of us to help the society around!
